name: XFONE
overview:
Xfone, Inc., through its subsidiaries, offers a range of communications services. It delivers local telephony service to its customers through an â€˜on-netâ€™ UNE-L connection, including voice mail, caller ID, forwarding, 3-way calling, blocking, and PBX services. The company also provides international and local carrier services; and local, long distance, and high-speed broadband Internet services, as well as cable television services. In addition, it offers Web hosting and wide area networking solutions for business applications; video services, including basic cable, video on demand, HDTV, and DVR; private line services; and wholesale switched termination services. The company markets its services through direct sales executives, independent contractor agents and resellers, third party direct sales organizations, workerâ€™s councils, retail and wholesale sales offices, direct marketing channels, telecommunications trade shows, and Internet. It also serves governmental agencies, resellers, telecommunications companies, and mobile users.

The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Lubbock, Texas.

funding_rounds.source_description: PRIDE NETWORK RECEIVES APPROVAL FOR $36.1 MILLION IN ADDITIONAL FUNDING OF PROJECTS UNDER THE BROADBAND INITIATIVE PROGRAM OF THE AMERICAN RECOVERY AND REINVESTMENT ACT
